summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Jobni platform - Arabic job portal with admin, employer, and job seeker functionality. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend integration working with minor UI issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Click timeout on category filter dropdown - element appears to be intercepted by overlay

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (26/26 tests passed)
User authentication for all roles (admin, employer, job_seeker)
Job CRUD operations (create, read, update, search, filter)
Job application flow (apply, view applications, status updates)
Admin dashboard with statistics and user management
Employer job creation and application management
Nafath button properly disabled as requested
Arabic RTL layout and content display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix category filter dropdown click issue - likely z-index or overlay problem preventing proper interaction. Consider adding force=true to click or adjusting CSS positioning.
